name: Alita: Unbreakable Warrior
description:
Alita: Unbreakable Warrior is an action role playing game inspired by the universe of Alita: Battle Angel. 

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Play as a female cyborg, and use your legendary martial art Panzer Kunst to become a bounty hunter killing criminals in Iron City. Choose your playstyle and explore 2 iconic levels.

Based in the original manga Battle Angel Alita and the critically acclaimed movie produced by James Cameron, the plot of the game is set in a futuristic, cyberpunk, post-apocalyptic world.

Alita: Unbreakable Warrior is a project developed by third year students of the Degree in Video Game Design and Development at CITM (Universitat Politècnica de Catalunya).
